meanings.definition: A quadrilateral with only one pair of parallel sides.
meanings.sent1: I drew two trapezoids in my math class today.
meanings.sent2: The building had a unique roof made of trapezoids.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoids on the playground looked like giant slices of cake.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like trapezoids in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoids in the puzzle fit together perfectly.

meanings.definition: A geometric shape with four sides, one pair of which are parallel.
meanings.sent1: The trapezoids on the worksheet were easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The road signs were shaped like trapezoids to stand out.
meanings.sent3: The trapezoids on the screen seemed to dance as the animation played.
meanings.sent4: His smile formed trapezoids of happiness on his face.
meanings.sent5: The trapezoids in the art project added a modern touch.
